mapper.select: select a.no,a.reason,a.reg_date as regDate,a.accept,a.mem_no as memNo,a.IDENTITY,a.key_no as keyNo,b.name as memName from accusation a,member b where b.no=a.mem_no
select a.no,a.reason,a.reg_date as regDate,a.accept,a.mem_no as memNo,a.IDENTITY,a.key_no as keyNo,b.name as memName from accusation a,member b where b.no=a.mem_no and a.no=#{no}
